name: Jingle Jangle: Toy Workshop
description:
Local 4 player competitive game. Can be played with 1 player. Can only be played with controllers. The button prompt on Mannequins are broken, but you can still put things on there. Sometimes when you go out of reach the prompt is still there but you cant put it on because you're out of reach.

Use your sound mixer to turn the volume down, we didn't have time to make a settings screen for this.

Credits:

- Richard Janssen: Code

- Frank Severijns: Code

- Yvette Verheyen: Art

- Catherine Linklater: Sound

- Paul van der Maarel: Art

- Roy Snijders: Logo, Typography
